post.body: I love to spend money on yarn.The colors/textures make me want to EAT it!
You're a doll,naw,compared to them Ca ladies and Linda(made of iron,not sticks!),I need to cut down.Trying to try!
Kids now ask"what's new with Maggie?"LOL-you've tuned us in to so many great deals,funstuff,&you're on TV!!!Will ask our brary.
Do you cook oats the full 5-10 minutes or leave them a little more raw?great recipe btw!
paucity of sauce on a plethora of spaghetti? EEK
I would've paid money to listen to it!
Was 60s here too,now going to 40's -have the clariten D ready for morning!I hate the cold.
AppleStore!I flush red and heart pounds-no kidding!Need EVERYTHING for my so called non life!!!Crying with you...
Oh I know girl.the 1/2 dozen is a good idea, and only 6 of us did it, 14 did the ornament exchange game..dang,cookie dough is good
Well,I've heard that the real Santa loves Polar Express,so Tyler was right!
I've been a puffball for 2 days-will not miss cookies again until next year! (please God!)
I never heard of this!Now on the to-do list for next day off!Thanx!Hope our 'brary is hip to it!
Crabby,nagging
I hear your aggravation.And the cookies seem to mount to 8million.I cut it from the obligatory one dozen each to 8 each.
Oh Mandy that sounds awful!Are you a little better today?
That governer!I thought it was an actor! Whatta punk!!!Makes poor horny Eliot Spitzer seem saintly!
Yah,next year do fat chocolate chips.I do oatmeal chocolate chips-they are always everyone's favorite, and quick.
Actually,looks good!But I hang around vegan yogi's...
Still seems a standard,safest for the heart. to max at 85 percent in an interval,not steadystate...but yeah,seems low huh? YAY!
What kind did ya make?Vicarious munching !!!Puffball memories of last week's cookie orgy keep me to broccoli though!
But thing of all the wings you've acquired!
Ok!Always been hardcore,now gentler.Got'em in a trade, i"ll let ya know!I LOVE SqueezeStronger(t.Effinger)at the moment!
Have a quick flight,its so dehumanizing anymore,who would think Greyhound would be more luxurious?
HA!How true,when I'm nagging on cleaning chores tomorrow am,I'll try to remember!
Yes-broccoli,grapefruit,2 liters of water,organic turkey on huge salad.Really felt awful,not guilt,just toxic!
jumping on a box is not a smart move-maybe you're not scared,you have some sense!
Bad hair can hurt.Gonna do anything wild and crazy?
no,my 12 year old could say"Eat Ezekial bread, not wonder bread," I find his info to be beyond basic,but must help some!
I won't see BB until I hear if its an ok ending-I hate leaving feeling tearful!Want to see Doubt,but hear it ends in doubt!
When I was a student at the Sorbonne,I took mime!
Oh I remember it well(NY&NJ),not even a Hummer can manage in ice.Be careful!
Chopping Veggies is monumental.Its one MORE thing ya HAVE to do-totally get where you're coming from!
Hate winter too.Watching NY/NJ on the news this am.Hubby and I kissed our S.Va ground at 51degrees!
LOL-bootcamp and cookies and booze...perfect evening for me!
you've had CT/MRI,migraine workups?EMGs and the autoimmune workups too?Big hugs!!!!
Silly! Red Wine IS clean!
Womens' lives are like that,cycles of struggle,anxiety, with relief and maybe happiness.
He adored that boy-who had severe health problems,but so young,and such a loving family....
about pain meds-take your laxatives-narcs are like bricks.Home already?! You need ME there to tend to you!Tell hubby to sub for me!
Awesome!Hey times are tough,my grampa used to play poker during "hard times"....
Where in Ireland are you?My family comes from Cork,Wicklow,and the ne'er do wells from Donegal!
Oh SWEETIE!I should be there to recover you and give you some TLC!!! Fresh sheets and pjs out of dryer and lifetime movie!
:) love you!
Home from work,hope to get out early.Kids playing fiddles for Kiwannis fancy ball-so fancy,we poor Christian-school moms can't go in!
But the next day,woke up puffball,depressed(not from eating,I had figured in the calories)but that sugar load really makes for sugar blues!
woundcare meeting today.workout then nap?Gotta figure out why pix are not transferring from blackberry!!!
60 degrees,dogs are swarming.finish workout,interrupted by class trip, then dogs out for a spell.
Wondering what I'd do if I actually had a life,how would I blog,tweet,surf,facebook,mind everyones business?
loving that Connor now evicted w/xbox from my room and LOVING my new TV.
Kids/hubby watchng Achmed the dead terrorist on MY new TV in MY fresh bed.I'm on big chair,thinking of warm milk w/vanilla..and motrin.
Going to try NY ballet workouts I got in a trade.Wavering on Chalene's newest.She was so nice when I taught TK,but with these shoulders....
Son wore suit,old folks stopped me saying what a fine looking young man,how talented the Christian school strings band is,moment of joy.
Worked,got Connor from violen concert-Kiwannis Ball,local rich seniors were tipsy,our boys were perplexed by had a great time.
home,kids babysitting,but should be home soon.TV freezing,think its the dvr causing it...threw sparks when I changed the power cord.hmm
Listening to hub clean oven,poor vac is squeeking(vac in the oven?!)
Shopaholic coming to the movies February~life is good!
Chalean Extreme enroute to me.She was nice to me when I taught TK,and BB usurps her nice nature, and the workouts look good!
Getting my 530,90minute hot yoga class back again for the New Year,have mastered no shoulder yoga and ready to take it back!
Going to start knitting a hat today.Last one made me look like Cat in the Hat.
Finished UndomesticGoddess in one day.Reminds me of me decades ago.Heavier fluff for Kinsella if one was ever a coporate slave.
Won't see Benjamin Button unless it has a happy ending!
Mrs.Duggar just had baby 18.Bionic Uterus..always fear something will break that bubble they live in....
Finishing coffee,gonna exercise,shop for stocking stuffers,get kids,figure something for dinner.
Going up to bed to read,watchTV with hubby, and sleep.Eating too much junk-inner turmoil? Me? NAW!!!
PuffingAdvair again,6weeks of colds/sinus woes did it.Ahh,breathing,how I missed you!
Watching BigLove rerun with hubby.Basset is twirling 3OCD times to get THE spot!Cat catching along side.Bed is crowded!
Home,ready for bed and sleep, day off tomorrow to get ready for kids back to school.
Mad that just as I decide to buy the Reebok 25lb adjustable weights, some idiot bought the other one, and I need two,what DORKbuys ONE!
Looking at my blonde hair!Back to my racially blonde roots!Gotta sleep,ICU in am,always pleasant on weekends.
HI!Like your blog,you sound alot like me!I love figs too btw! AND I'm from Albany!
Having a hair attack,must have bleach asap or risk apoplexy.
Home from 13 hrs.work, 30 minutes intervals-halfassed,but done, glass of wine and some nyquil for improved sinuses and sleep in!YAY!
Home for the next 9 hours, NewYears in ICU-hope we make it bearable for everyone! Gorsh its cold out thar!
Off to check on hubby,no sounds from backyard,must verify he is not dead.Beagle just showed up,no sign of Lhasie or hubby.
Hubby doing battle with electric fence and 8lb Lhasa Apso.Hear him wheezing and muttering.Pup is digggin hole to escape under fence...
